actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to modify the charitable distribution requirements imposed upon foundations.

summary.text: Sets the applicable percentage for determining the minimum investment return for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code tax on failure to distribute income by a private foundation at five percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to modify the charitable distribution requirements imposed upon foundations.
